name: Flickr
short_description:
Flickr is a mobile application and social network that offers an online photo
sharing network for its users.
long_description:
Flickr is a mobile application and social network that offers an online photo
sharing network for its users. It provides its users with the ability to
capture, share, and view a number of images related to many categories. The
application also provides its users with the ability to integrate the
application with the camera of the device and capture professional photographs
in high resolution. In addition, it provides free editing tools, live filters,
HD video recording, and more. Flickr enables its users to store over 500,000
photographs. It is available for Android and iOS devices. Currently owned by
[Yahoo!](http://www.crunchbase.com/organization/yahoo), Flickr was founded in
2004 by [Caterina Fake]( http://www.crunchbase.com/person/caterina-fake) and
[Stewart Butterfield]( http://www.crunchbase.com/person/stewart-butterfield) in
Sunnyvale, California.
